meanings.definition: To push or jab with a finger or sharp object.
meanings.sent1: She decided to poke the balloon with a pin.
meanings.sent2: He likes to poke his little brother playfully.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten tried to poke its paw under the door.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to poke at his insecurities.
meanings.sent5: The curious child poked the ant hill with a stick, watching the insects scatter.

meanings.definition: A quick, sharp blow or thrust.
meanings.sent1: He felt a poke on his shoulder and turned around.
meanings.sent2: The poke from the stick startled the cat.
meanings.sent3: The poke in the ribs made him jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The poke of the needle was quick but painful.
meanings.sent5: She gave him a playful poke in the side to get his attention.

meanings.definition: To stir or mix with a spoon or other utensil.
meanings.sent1: She used a wooden spoon to poke the soup gently.
meanings.sent2: He liked to poke the cake batter until it was smooth.
meanings.sent3: The chef would poke the sauce to ensure it was well blended.
meanings.sent4: The children loved to poke their fingers into the cookie dough.
meanings.sent5: She would poke the paint with a brush to create a textured effect.

meanings.definition: A small, quick meal or snack.
meanings.sent1: She grabbed a quick poke before heading out the door.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed a poke of popcorn while watching the movie.
meanings.sent3: The office always had a bowl of candy for a midday poke.
meanings.sent4: The vending machine offered various pokes for a quick bite.
meanings.sent5: She packed a healthy poke of fruits for her afternoon snack.

meanings.definition: To search or rummage around in something.
meanings.sent1: The detective decided to poke around the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent2: She would poke through the box of old toys looking for her favorite.
meanings.sent3: The kids loved to poke around in the garden for hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: He would poke into every corner of the attic searching for the lost key.
meanings.sent5: She carefully poked through the pile of papers on her desk to find the missing document.
